docs.abstract: Teaching resources for sex education or talking about sex with young people. This is the second installment in Adolescent Health Week.

byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

docs.lead_paragraph: It's never easy to talk about sex, but we've tried to make it as easy as possible with this collection of resources, our second installment in Adolescent Health Week.

docs.lead_paragraph: Even with advanced technology to monitor the unborn, each year 27,000 fetuses that pass the 20th week of gestation and 13,000 that reach the 28th week or beyond are born dead.

headline.seo: Though Declining, Stillbirths Continue to Devastate
headline.main: In Decline, Stillbirths Continue to Devastate
